itemId.description: Unique, auto increment identifier for the item

type.description: The type of bookshelf item; book, article, video, movie, series, game, music, podcast, learning resource, audiobook, other people's projects

dateAdded.description: Dat the item was added to the Bookshelf (YYYY-MM-DD)

creator.description: Name of author, writer, artist, director, or other creator of the listed item

year.description: The year the item was released/published

description.description: A short description about the item

externalURI.description: Optional, external link. Absolute URI allowed(protocol+host+path)

relatedThoughtURI.description: Optional link to related Thought post. Absolute(protocol+host+path) and relative URI(relative to root or to file location) allowed
